law.catch_line: Conveyance of court facility to Commonwealth.
law.text: A court facility which is entirely dedicated to Court of Justice purposes may be conveyed to the Commonwealth for court purposes with or without consideration. Provided, however, that no such conveyance shall be accepted by the Commonwealth unless the Administrative Office of the Courts has certified its agreement to maintain the facility.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 449, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1982.
